answers.answer: Hello,Jealousy and gossip are not usually a symptom of diabetes.However, if blood sugars are very high or very low (uncontrolled diabetes) then mental changes can occur.  If blood sugar is well controlled there should be no symptoms.Maybe this is an issue with her not related to the diabetes.

question: Halo,I'm new here. I have a problem. I got married since 3 months, and now I'm living with my husband and my mother in law. She has diabetes and It's very difficult to live with her. She pretends that she loves me,,, but all the time she speaks gossips about me to my husband.My husband believe her because she is his mother. I wonder if somebody here in forum, tell me if jealousy and gossips are symptoms of diabetes....I'm sorry but I' trying to learn to live with my new family in harmony...I have not enough information about diabetes...could someone help me?many thanks, Silvia
title: diabetes and feeling jealous
